post.body: thanks, sadly there are still a few bugs in Civi so no importing today :/
why not HRC?
wow, bold move! was there a last straw w/ firefox / appeal to safari? congrats to you both, i hope you'll be happy together :)
Cheese steak at the Avenue Grille (Dot) and most sandwiches at Flour Bakery (So. Boston) are both favorites of mine
count my vote for tratoria il panino
really enjoyed your online video guide (http://tinyurl.com/599k4c), can you suggest places to learn about what camera t ...
Let go? What has you up at this hour, anyways?
I'm jealous - seems like every day at least a few auto-DMs await me. Still hasn't driven me to unfollow... yet. Buenas noches!
Did you find a charity not affected by beer? How about climate change, vocational programs, museums, or? DM me for local examples.
Happy Birthday! #happy09
Apocalypse night? Sounds entertaining, but far to cold to be dressing as a zombie. Is this a bar crawl?
I have also benchmraked some great resources at http://delicious.com/kgilnack/twitter
I'd suggest @kanter's blog http://is.gd/cS3 for some great Twitter tips
Nice illustrations - I'm a big fan of "Out of the Box" http://ericmsmith.com/portfolio/
Thanks for following back; finally joined Ning thanks to Stark Reality http://bit.ly/TdTl. Looking forward to tweeting with you.
Enjoy your Cambridge/Brookline NYE - mine will be a Back Bay/Brookline new year's.
I would definitely recommend Milk if you're still looking for a good movie http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1013753/
it's rly sticking out there now, time to try to beat some of the rush on the T and call it a day. cheers for now, tweeple. enjoy the snow!

rt @kravetski @nptechblogs Washington Post creates giving map - where to donate locally http://tinyurl.com/482sky
challenge of the day: importing all of our excel and access dbs into Civi on my own for the first time.. oh boy!
learning about Drupal Views from our brilliant designer Jim Taylor at Rooty Hollow http://www.rootyhollow.com/
strongly recommends the movie 'Milk' - tells an important story (esp after prop 8) and is very well done. http://ping.fm/sf9mg
looking for a talented intern to learn about & assist with development next semester http://ping.fm/KXvCw
Salary Reserve for low paid human service workers still being held up, but gets coverage from the Boston Globe: http://ping.fm/Vb8G3
back to the grind after a fantastic 4-day weekend... trying to get through a full inbox one email at a time
BB King (or his label/producer) has definitely embraced web 2.0, nice site http://tinyurl.com/63btka
Treo fails & will be replaced with old BB when I will pay for data. BB, pls don''t make me buy data, i just want to sync my contacts & cal.
getting great advice from @bbravo 's e-office hours re: online audio and video http://ping.fm/3Kj1g
thanks @michael_hoffman for the quick help finding info on cameras. props again for your Guide to Online Video http://www.see3.net/guide/
This trailer tells the bigger picture much more compellingly http://knowmorenonprofits.com/trailer.html
Great point! In MA, human service orgs alone directly serve at least 1 in 10 residents http://is.gd/eoI8
RT @gtak: "Nonprofit connections" in media and in life are much more prevalent than most people think.
RT @lilpecan If it's a superflous auto DM with a link I'm now unfollowing. Don't have time for that anymore. - A good NY Resolut'n #Happy09?
RT @just_kate Last few days of holiday push-just need 1 thoughtful comment from u to get $1 to charity! http://tinyurl.com/57wcpe (Pls RT)

Be safe and have a wonderful New Year's Eve. Time to join the celebrations...
Boston Celebrators: Evening trains (MBTA) will provide rush-hour levels of service and will run until approximately 2:00 a.m.
